Text: I set up  account just to thank VTV for the daily show. Without access to big fat pipes to get the comedy central feed, torrents are the way for me to keep up on the best from the daily show and VTV is my messenger! Thanks a ton!

By the way, this Arne guy is kind of a dope and is a good example of why the US EDU system is a shambles. He has many good "lines" but good tag lines and marketing pitches for TV interviews, but they equate to nothing without execution.
